amendment.description: Amendment reauthorizes the Olympic Education Scholarship program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 5 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998, to authorize $5 million for each of the next five fiscal years for the Olympic Scholarship program, which provides college scholarships for Olympic athletes while they train.

action.text: On agreeing to the Stupak amendment (A032) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 200 (Roll No. 132).
